dataIdInfo.idAbs:
Kauai County regulatory Zoning designations as of September 2023. Downloaded by the Hawaii Statewide GIS Program from the Kauai County Open Geospatial Data Portal, September 18, 2023 (https://kauai-open-data-kauaigis.hub.arcgis.com/). The Hawaii Statewide GIS Program downloads periodic updates of this layer from the County of Kauai, projects the data from State Plane to the UTM projection and stores in the State GIS geodatabase as a convenience to State GIS users. The GIS Program also posts the data to the Internet as a convenience to the public. FOR MOST CURRENT VERSION OF KAUAI COUNTY ZONING, users should visit the Kauai County Open GIS Data Portal site - https://kauai-open-data-kauaigis.hub.arcgis.com/.

For more information, please refer to complete metadata at https://files.hawaii.gov/dbedt/op/gis/data/cty_zoning_kau.pdf or contact Hawaii Statewide GIS Program, Office of Planning and Sustainable Development, State of Hawaii; PO Box 2359, Honolulu, Hi. 96804; (808) 587-2846; email: gis@hawaii.gov; Website: https://planning.hawaii.gov/gis.
dataIdInfo.idPurp:

Downloaded by the Hawaii Statewide GIS Program from the Kauai County Open Geospatial Data Portal, September 18, 2023 (https://kauai-open-data-kauaigis.hub.arcgis.com/). The Hawaii Statewide GIS Program downloads periodic updates of this layer from the County of Kauai, projects the data from State Plane to the UTM projection and stores in the State GIS geodatabase as a convenience to State GIS users. The GIS Program also posts the data to the Internet as a convenience to the public. FOR MOST CURRENT VERSION OF KAUAI COUNTY ZONING, users should visit the Kauai County Open GIS Data Portal site - https://kauai-open-data-kauaigis.hub.arcgis.com/.

dataIdInfo.idCredit: Kauai GIS for Kauai Planning Dept

Consts.useLimit: LIMITATION OF USE: Zoning data is provided only for general reference or use. The digital zoning map depicts the approximate location of land uses, facilities, and zoning district boundaries, based partially on parcels that are non-survey grade as illustration only. DISCLAIMER: This electronic copy of Kaua‘i’s zoning map is believed to be up-to-date but the County does not warranty its accuracy. (Note: This version of the data was downloaded by the Hawaii Statewide GIS Program - for a more current version, visit the County of Hawaii Open Geospatial Data Portal at https://kauai-open-data-kauaigis.hub.arcgis.com/). Final confirmation of zoning must be provided by the County of Kauai Planning Department.The County of Kaua‘i shall have no liability with regard to the digital zoning map. The County of Kaua‘i does not warrant that the map will meet the requirements of users or that the map will be error free, or that map defects will be corrected. The entire risk as to the quality and usefulness of the map and zoning designations and the entire risk arising out of the use or performance of this map and documentation rests with the user. In no event shall the County of Kaua‘i, or anyone else involved in the creation, production or delivery of this map, be liable for any damages whatsoever whether in contract or in tort, including but not limited to lost profits, lost savings, lost data, business interruption, computer failure or malfunction, or other pecuniary loss or any direct, indirect or incidental damages or other economic consequential damages, or for any claim or demand against the County of Kaua‘i by any other party, arising out of the use or inability to use this map, even if the County of Kaua‘i, or anyone else involved in the creation, production or delivery of this map, has been advised of the possibility of such damages.The limitation of remedies described in this Section also apply to any third-party supplier of materials to the County of Kaua‘i. The limitations of liabilities of the County of Kaua‘i and its third-party suppliers are not cumulative. Each such third-party supplier is an intended beneficiary of this Section. While the County of Kaua‘i has made every effort to offer the most current and correct information as possible, inadvertent errors in information are possible and said Zoning Map is not guaranteed and without warranty of any representation. Please contact the Planning Department at (808) 241-4050 if you believe there is an error with the map or have questions or concerns. GIS Disclaimer: The Geographic Information Systems (GIS) maps and data are made available solely for informational purposes. The GIS data is not the official representation of any of the information included, and do not replace a site survey or legal document descriptions. The County of Kauai (County) makes or extends no claims, representations or warranties of any kind, either express or implied, including, without limitation, the implied warranties of merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose, as to the quality, content, accuracy, currency, or completeness of the information, text, maps, graphics, links and other items contained in any of the GIS data. In no event shall the County become liable for any errors or omissions in the GIS, and will not under any circumstances be liable for any direct, indirect, special, incidental, consequential, or other loss, injury or damage caused by its use or otherwise arising in connection with its use, even if specifically advised of the possibility of such loss, injury or damage. The data and or functionality on this site may change periodically and without notice. In using the GIS data, users agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless the County of Kauai for any and all liability of any nature arising out of or resulting from the lack of accuracy or correctness of the data, or the use of the data.
